Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, though already SLS program (or are working), I decided to put my work on the Projects. Although the model is old, I've been working on this modeling Projects completed but just 2-3 days ago, I found at NASA model, and took some small parts.

Work itself is in a beta version, and the missile itself may not work properly (for example about the output payload I'm not sure that everything is correct)

Notes:

1.Almost all models have two kinds of textures, so it is strongly recommended to put Firespitter

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/22583-firespitter-propeller-plane-and-helicopter-parts-v71-may-5th-for-ksp-10/

2.some texture is not the best quality, and some parts have almost no texture. :-)

3.Orion solar panels do not work, me need a deeper understanding of their work, and Orion has no new reflective version.

4.Orion has two parachutes, one on the top cover (low), the other has its own model.

5.If you decide to try a beta version and find mistakes please inform.

Pictures.

 

And Orion in game.

 

 

Developers addon:
DECQ
Marcelo Silveira

 

SLS beta version 0.2 is available.
1. Added reflective Orion (the last version of the Official NASA)
2. rename all files from the Apollo, on Orion :-)
3. Some of the changes in stage 3 (What carries two J2X) Just decoupler Stage_3 now has a mesh, it is upraschaet changing textures Firespitter.
4. Changed some parameters in the rocket.
5. Completely different model engines J2X and RL 10, RL10 has animation deployment ,although it is not as gameplay is not affected.
6. Added support for ORION TextureReplacer and J2X.
7. Removed Upper_stage with four RL10

 

Beta version 0.3
First of all, thank Marcelo Silveira for their invaluable contribution to this add-on, thanks to him, this add-on supports,Marcelo is now included in the developer of this add-on!

1.
Additions by Marcelo Silveira
RealPlume - all engines and SSRB https://github.com/KSP-RO/RealPlume/wiki


MechJeb -Orion CM http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/111978-part-105-anatid-robotics-mumech-mechjeb-autopilot-v255-dec-3rd/


RemoteTech -Orion CM http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/75245-105-remotetech-v169-2015-11-10/&page=1


TAC Life Support -Orion SM http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/37449-105-tac-life-support-v01121-12dec/#comment-516949


Hull Camera -Orion docking port http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/42739-105hullcam-vds-nightvision-dockingcam-and-other-filtersupdated11-nov/#comment-590800


RealChute -Orion Parashutes http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/52931-105wenkel-corporation-realchute-parachute-systems-v1326-21215/
AnimatedDecouplers -Orion SM http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/120305-104-animated-decouplers/#comment-2166396


As was the correct description for the add-on parts, as well as the balance in temperature!

 

 

Further:
2. Slightly changed the balance in the Rocket, SSRB also now more traction and fuel.
3. Added Decoupler_LVSA

4. Add the fairing for LVSA

5. Added fairing for Upper stage

6. Added Upper stage with four RL10 (Engines are built into the model but have animation)
7. Change the animation for RL10, is now completely covers the nozzle moving part of the engine
8. Changed mount
DECOUPLER_ORION_STAGE3, now he attaches only ORION, to use the payload stock Decoupler.

9.ESMP is now mounted to the Orion SM.

10. Fairing_top 3 stage is no longer tied to  Orion, they now serve as a regular fairing.

Beta version 0.3B

Added a link for download.
Engines "In addition RL10" have the right gimbal, changed texture for Orion silver.

 

 

Add-on includes a plugins

Engine Thrust Controller  - Do not know who and where the developer official page :-(
and

Texture Replacer - official Feed http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/96851-105-texturereplacer-2411-17112015/

 

HIGHLY RECOMMEND: This plugin allows you to switch between textures.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/22583-firespitter-propeller-plane-and-helicopter-parts-v71-may-5th-for-ksp-10/

DOWNLOAD

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/9at1afyj10jkd2z/AACV3TIRTFLEElM4hFL0mp2Fa?dl=0

All rights reserved.

Edited February 23, 2016 by DECQ
V 0.3B

Ohh, looks pretty good. Will totally try.

 

Update- Tried it, and found a few bugs maybe you should know about. The RL10 flame effects come out way to far up relative to the model, and the Orion parachute(main) does that thing where it deploys sideways.

Other than that, absolutly stunning quality! Though it's a little hard to assemble and the Orion stuff is nammed Apollo... which is a little off putting tbh.

Edited December 14, 2015 by VenomousRequiem
SLS mods are coming in swarms now! Great work. It looks awesome
Can you make Orion silver like the real thing will be?

love this

hope to see more
That orion looks awesome!!!

On 15.12.2015, 0:00:08, VenomousRequiem said:

 

Sorry, I missed the day and managed to do quite a bit, well, at least ten people voted at the moment want to see the continuation of eight.

On 15.12.2015, 0:00:08, VenomousRequiem said:

Ohh, looks pretty good. Will totally try.

 

Update- Tried it, and found a few bugs maybe you should know about. The RL10 flame effects come out way to far up relative to the model, and the Orion parachute(main) does that thing where it deploys sideways.

Other than that, absolutly stunning quality! Though it's a little hard to assemble and the Orion stuff is nammed Apollo... which is a little off putting tbh.

RL10 gets a new look, I'll fix the flame really almost did not check the SLS, see what a parachute, just renamed ORION files cfg picked up from the Apollo  :).

On 15.12.2015, 0:49:42, _Augustus_ said:

Can you make Orion silver like the real thing will be?

Yes, there is the latest version of Orion Command Module.

 

 

About 10 minutes do the update, and it will be there.

2. rename all files from the Apollo, on Orion :-)

DOWNLOAD:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/6j1ur0fe75b9q77/AAA3QF_cFSStr_HAmYwjsZeTa?dl=0

I found some interesting information, is very similar project was about 30 years ago and was called "Symmetric shuttle," this proves that everything new is well forgotten old. :-)

Is there any more information from someone else? Very interesting.

Edited December 16, 2015 by DECQ

15 minutes ago, DECQ said:

I found some interesting information, is very similar project was about 30 years ago and was called "Symmetric shuttle," this proves that everything new is well forgotten old. :-)

Is there any more information from someone else? Very interesting.

Check Astronautix with All LV's having RS-25s. I've seen it before, and I think there were plans to make it have a sustainer engine. (IE: Like an Atlas) 

 

PS: Can you make this RO? And are we going to see an IVA with this beauty?

Edited December 16, 2015 by davidy12

19 minutes ago, davidy12 said:

Check Astronautix with All LV's having RS-25s. I've seen it before, and I think there were plans to make it have a sustainer engine. (IE: Like an Atlas) 

 

PS: Can you make this RO? And are we going to see an IVA with this beauty?

Okay,i look at this.

With RO I have a problem at the moment (just hangs at boot), but I wanted to start working on it.
Need more information about IVA on Orion, of course, it is desirable that it have its own IVA.

Very nice update. Tried it in school, an eighth grader banged on my keyboard and killed 3 people. 

10/10.
This looks cool, I'll try it on my real computer tomorrow.

I think this is the best SLS i ever seen in KSP.

But I have a little issue. The Solarpanel doesn`t work.

15 hours ago, VenomousRequiem said:

Very nice update. Tried it in school, an eighth grader banged on my keyboard and killed 3 people. 

10/10.

Ah, nostalgia, I remember when I was in school and we put the first computers it was a holiday, it is now so commonplace and not surprising.
Well,  I learned even more "fine" of Information about SLS (thanks Dragon01) and some will alter it.

3 hours ago, Cheesecake said:

I think this is the best SLS i ever seen in KSP.

But I have a little issue. The Solarpanel doesn`t work.

Thank you for the kind words, for solar panels do not work, I'll look at them today, how to fix it.
Can you add back the 4xRL-10 upper stage? It still the notional EUS for the SLS, not the one with the J2X.

8 minutes ago, DarthVader said:

Can you add back the 4xRL-10 upper stage? It still the notional EUS for the SLS, not the one with the J2X.

Of course, I'm just a few will alter Upper stage and put this version in a new form. A little patience, please.

I have found another little issue:

The Orion-Parachute has TechRequired = largeControl. This isn`t a technode in the stock techtree. I think it`s a node of a Techtreemod.

22 minutes ago, Cheesecake said:

I have found another little issue:

The Orion-Parachute has TechRequired = largeControl. This isn`t a technode in the stock techtree. I think it`s a node of a Techtreemod.

This is just a beta test, it is not connected to the career mode as a whole. If there are people who understand in this mode, I would be delighted , and I do not know how it works. :-\

Think it's time to start making Altair, simultaneously improve the SLS and Orion.

I look at the career mode, but for the final result will not answer. 

Edited December 17, 2015 by DECQ

Does anybody want a RealPlume config for SLS?

 

 

Edited December 18, 2015 by Marcelo Silveira
Can it work in RO/RSS?

8 hours ago, MinnusMarch said:

Can it work in RO/RSS?

At the moment, it is not connected to the RO. I can connect it to all RSS addons except RO, though without the RO This makes no sense.

Beta version 0.3
